means: <史>自耕农，自由民( yeoman的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: He would repeat the word " Yeomen " as if it afforded him consolation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他要把 自耕农 三个字重复一下,好象给他安慰似的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译Y_百度文库 ... yeomanry 自由民 yeomen 自耕农 E-02 Y chromosome Y 染色体.
这样的自由农，后来又称之为约曼（yeomen）。在法兰西，上层个体农户一般拥有10公顷到50公顷的土地，其人数不超过农民总数的…

list.abs: The class of yeomen ; small freeholding farmers ., 自由民自由民阶级 ; 小自耕农.
yeomen是什... ... yeoman-yeomen1.  自由人，侍者，仆人，自耕农 yeomen of the guard1. 王室警卫 yeomen,yeomanettes1.  没听出来.

entry.def: In former times, a yeoman was a man who was free and not a servant, and who owned and worked on his own land.

auth_sentence.content: With it came the ceremonial post of Captain of the Yeomen of the Guard.
auth_sentence.res_content: With it came the ceremonial post of Captain of the Yeomen of the Guard.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With it came the ceremonial post of Captain of the Yeomen of the Guard.

auth_sentence.content: You wait ages, then two semi-staged versions of The Yeomen of the Guard arrive within months.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: You wait ages, then two semi-staged versions of The Yeomen of the Guard arrive within months.
